title: Murdoch’s TikTok? Trump offers allies another lever of media control
summary: TikTok is set to form a new board following a deal with China, which will include prominent figures like the Murdochs and Ellisons. This restructuring comes amid ongoing scrutiny over data privacy and security concerns. The changes aim to address regulatory issues while maintaining the platform's operations in the U.S.

title: Officials reportedly identify Dallas Ice facility shooter; DHS corrects death toll down to one person killed – live
summary: Joshua Jahn allegedly killed one detainee and severely injured two others before taking his own life. The incident has sparked political controversy, with JD Vance attributing the rise in political violence to Democrats. This tragic event highlights growing concerns about safety and violence in detention facilities.
